description: 'ASK QUESTIONS AS OFTEN AS YOU POSSIBLY CAN. DO NOT MAKE ANY ASSUMPTIONS ABOUT THE USERS INTENT OR PREFERENCES. IF THE USER HAS NOT EXPLICITLY PROVIDED CONSENT TO A CHANGE, DO NO PROCEED WITHOUT ASKING FIRST VIA THE #ask_questions TOOL.'
applyTo: '*'
---

ASK QUESTIONS AS OFTEN AS YOU POSSIBLY CAN. DO NOT MAKE ANY ASSUMPTIONS ABOUT THE USERS INTENT OR PREFERENCES. IF THE USER HAS NOT EXPLICITLY PROVIDED CONSENT TO A CHANGE, DO NO PROCEED WITHOUT ASKING FIRST VIA THE #tool:vscode/askQuestions TOOL.
